Reviews.Title: why would you buy this??
Reviews.Author: Boost customer
Reviews.Content: Why would anyone buy a $50 card for $65?!? Go to Walmart, the gas station, Radioshack, or any of the other million places that sell boost mobile cards, buy the card for $50 plus tax, or go online and do it there! This is completely senseless to spend the extra money when it is not necessary!!

Reviews.Title: Card
Reviews.Author: Rikeita B.
Reviews.Content: I never received this card. This I ended up having to go out and buy a card. I was waiting on this one but I did not receive it,

Reviews.Title: Terrible coverage and service
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I was with Boost Mobile for a little over 2 years, they were great at first but then one day I had no cell phone coverage where I lived. No bars at all for a month, I couldn't even call 911 if I wanted to, after that month I switched carriers. The customer service was totally unhelpful. I had emailed and called them more than once and they could not explain to me why I was not getting any service and they didn't refund my money back for that month. I went on facebook and a ton of other people were having the same experience. I went to their website several times and on their coverage map it showed that I had service even though I didn't. I feel sorry for people who order an expensive phone through Boost Mobile, thinking that their coverage map is accurate only to find out that they don't have and service.

Reviews.Content: got my card in like 2 days this is legit. its way overpriced but it is legit and did come in
